int ec_abort_test_case ( DLListIterator  work_case_item  ) 

Function called byu UI to stop test case execution.

Parameters:
work_case_item pointer to dl_list_item containing selected test case
Returns:
result of operation: 0 if message was sent successfully, -1 in case of data or message queue error, -2 if case has already finished execution.

void ec_cleanup (  ) 

Function that takes care of removal of all created objects, freeing memory and so on.

int ec_configure (  ) 

Function reads config files in following order : MIN_CONF_DIR/min.conf, $HOME/.min/min.conf, ./min.conf. Settings with single value are overwritten, module and search paths are appended.

int ec_debug_case ( DLListIterator  work_case_item  ) 

Function called to debug one test case. Prequisite: before calling this function, case should be put in "selected_cases" list, and that's from where argument should be taken.

Parameters:
work_case_item pointer to item from "selected_cases" containing test case to be executed.
Returns:
-1 on error, otherwise 0

int ec_exec_case ( DLListIterator  work_case_item  ) 

Function called to execute one test case. Prequisite: before calling this function, case should be put in "selected_cases" list, and that's from where argument should be taken.

Parameters:
work_case_item pointer to item from "selected_cases" containing test case to be executed.
Returns:
-1 on error, otherwise 0

int ec_exec_test_case ( DLListIterator  work_case_item  ) 

Function called to execute one selected test case. It adds test case to selected test cases list, sets its status to ongoing and group id to 0, since it does not belong to group. Also, it adds new item to test case's results list.Function Sets module status to busy, then creates and sends MSG_EXE using data fetched from test case and module info

Parameters:
work_case_item pointer to list itemwith case to be executed
Returns:
result of operation(TBD)

void ec_min_init ( char *  envp_[],
int  operation_mode 
)

Function initializes all engine's global variables, creates message queues and threads. In case of problems during operations vital to test execution, function exits process - since if any of those operations fail - MIN will not be able to work anyway

Parameters:
completecallbk pointer to function called when test case completes
printcallbk pointer to function called when test case tries to print output
extifsendcallbk pointer to function sending external controller messages
envp pointer to enviroment settings var
operation_mode - describes what is the operation mode of min instance - 0 means console interface, 1 - external controller interface.

int ec_pause_test_case ( DLListIterator  work_case_item  ) 

Function called by UI to pause execution of selected test case.

Parameters:
work_case_item pointer to dl_list_item containig selected test case.
Returns:
result of operation :0 if message was sent successfully, -1 in case of data or message queue error, -2 if case is already paused, -3 if case is not running

int ec_read_settings ( char *  engine_ini  ) 

void ec_reinit (  ) 

Function for freeing the "session"

int ec_resume_test_case ( DLListIterator  work_case_item  ) 

Function called by UI to resume execution of previously paused case:

Parameters:
work_case_item pointer to dl_list_item containing selected test case
Returns:
: result of operation: 0 if message was sent successfully, -1 in case of data or message queue error, -2 if case was not paused, -3 if case is not running (not started or already finished).

Function called by user (external controller or console IF) to execute sequence of test cases

Parameters:

int ec_search_lib ( char *  mod_name  ) 

Function searches defined library search paths for library with given name

Parameters:
name of file to be found
Returns:
position of correct path on search paths list, or -1 if file is not found.

DLListIterator ec_select_case ( DLListIterator  work_case_item,
int  group_id 
)

Function used to select test case for execution - passed test case is copied, and then copied case is added to "selected" list. As this function modifies "selected" list, code that calls it should first lock "tec_mutex_", and unlock it after executing the function.

Parameters:
work_case_item DLList item containing selected case
group_id id of group to which case belongs
Returns:
item from "selected cases" list

: number of started modules
